short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small browser extension that enables the "Release Operation Lock Status (File/Folder)" button from remote access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small browser extension that enables the "Release Operation Lock Status (File/Folder)" button from remote access.

Currently tested on:
- Sharp MX-3071

Please help test the plugins for other models.
Feature requests are also highly appreciated!
